Zone Update Event Types¶

S4CLZoneUpdateEvent¶

class S4CLZoneUpdateEvent(zone: zone.Zone, is_paused: bool, ticks_since_last_update: int)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An event that occurs when the Zone is updated.

property is_paused¶

Determine if the game was paused during this event.

property ticks_since_last_update¶

The number of ticks since the last zone update.

property zone¶

The zone that was updated.
